articles.title: Microsoft, Google do a victory lap around passkeys - The Register
articles.description: Windows giant extends passwordless tech to everyone else
articles.content:
Microsoft today said it will now let us common folk not just commercial subscribers sign into their Microsoft accounts and apps using passkeys with their face, fingerprint, or device PIN.

articles.title: Apple sales see biggest fall in a year - BBC.com
articles.description: The tech giant says demand for its smartphones fell more than 10% in the first three months of the year.
